entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 8:10 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023
